examples: She rode her bicycle to the park.
He likes to take his bicycle on long rides.
Ella fue en su bicicleta al parque.
A él le gusta llevar su bicicleta en paseos largos.

suggested: Why did the bicycle fall over? Because it was two-tired.
I rode my bicycle to work today, but then realized my bike was stolen by the end of the day.
Why do some cars refuse to share the road with bicycles? They're just being pedal-pushers.
Did you know that the longest tandem bicycle in the world measured 20.03 m (65 ft 8 in) long and was built in the Netherlands?
The thrill of going fast down a hill on a bicycle.
Bicycling is a great way to get exercise and explore the outdoors.
The feeling of freedom when cycling down a quiet road or trail.
